actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to partially exclude interest earned in savings institutions from the gross income of certain taxpayers.
short_title: Small Savers Interest Exclusion Act of 1981

summary.text: Small Savers' Interest Exclusion Act of 1981 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $1,000 ($2,000 for joint returns) of the interest earned on savings accounts in banks, savings and loan associations, or credit unions.

titles.title: Small Savers Interest Exclusion Act of 1981
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to partially exclude interest earned in savings institutions from the gross income of certain taxpayers.
